summary: Cosmetic changed to Uthgerd to make her more appealing.  This is a personal mod I use so I thought I'd share with the community.
descriptionHtml:
I'm not an experienced mod maker, just an amateur with an opinion. Vanilla Uthgerd is old and ugly, there's no denying it. After finally figuring out how to correctly use the NPC editor, I tried my hand at making a better looking Uthgerd and wanted to share my opinion with the community. I changed her name to Ashari, after an aggressive and promiscuous girl I dated back in high school.

Her combat is pretty much the same. She's a beast with a 2 handed weapons, namely greatswords, and has perks to match. Her level scales with the player, she's quieter for those of you who are the sneaky type, and shouldn't trigger pressure plate traps. If you like it, please endorse.

**Note** I accidentally uploaded an earlier version that was not stealth friendly. If you want the quieter version, please use 1.5

Requirements:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
The Eyes of Beauty - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722

Recommended: (to look like the screenshots)
CBBE female body replacer - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666
Better females by Bella - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812 (no makeup version)

Installation:
Use NMM or simply drop the .esp and the .bsa files into the Data folder. It's that simple.

Uninstallation:
Use NMM or simply delete the .esp and the .bsa files from the Data folder. It's that simple.

Conflicts:
If you're using UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037), make sure this mod is loaded AFTER UFO, or you'll get the discolored vanilla head bug. It may just be doing this on my machine, but I don't have the slightest idea why it happens.

Thanks to the Nexus modding community, you guys make it possible to enjoy playing the same games over and over and over...

Special Thanks to FalmerBane. After using many of his beautifully done replacers, it inspired me to make some of my own.
author: DDey
